Sentencas: High performance anode supported proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells (PC-SOFC) were fabricated and their performance in syngas was studied.
Titulo: Insights into CO poisoning in high performance proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: PC-SOFC button cells produced a maximum power density of 812 mW cm(-2) in H-2 at 750 degrees C.
Titulo: Insights into CO poisoning in high performance proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It was found that the CO-containing feed streams could drastically degrade the performance of PC-SOFC.
Titulo: Insights into CO poisoning in high performance proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Based on the experimental results and the theoretical analysis, the detailed process of the CO-induced Ni catalyst deactivation was identified.
Titulo: Insights into CO poisoning in high performance proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This process could be divided into three distinguishable stages during the continuous exposure of the Ni catalyst in the CO-containing environment.
Titulo: Insights into CO poisoning in high performance proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The first stage could be described using the CO surface active site blocking mechanism, which was further confirmed by CO/H-2 competitive adsorption model.
Titulo: Insights into CO poisoning in high performance proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The second stage deactivation was proposed to be related to the carbon deposition at TPB (Triple-phase Boundary).
Titulo: Insights into CO poisoning in high performance proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The deactivation during this stage was accelerated by the electrochemical conversion of H-2.
Titulo: Insights into CO poisoning in high performance proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The last stage was attributed to the coking of Ni catalyst and the resulted metal dusting effect.
Titulo: Insights into CO poisoning in high performance proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells
